participant_1.name: Michael
participant_1.personality: Caring and determined, Michael is always focused on his family's well-being.
participant_1.background: my favorite movie is friday. i'm now looking for a new job. i'm a doctor. my daughter is a child prodigy. i enjoy going to the park.

participant_2.name: Sarah
participant_2.personality: Creative and introspective, Sarah often finds comfort in her hobbies and community activities.
participant_2.background: i'm scared of dying. i have dogs. knitting is my passion. the county wide bake sale is where i feel most at home.
